articles.description: Follow action from Sunday's four games in the Premier League including Man Utd v Brighton, Everton v Spurs, Forest v Southampton and Ipswich v Man City.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Everton vs Spurs, Man Utd vs Brighton, Nottingham Forest vs Southampton - scores & radio commentaries

articles.description: Brighton capitalise on a disastrous mistake from Manchester United goalkeeper Andre Onana as they claim a third successive Old Trafford victory.
articles.title: Manchester United 1-3 Brighton: Andre Onana howler puts seal on impressive Seagulls win

articles.description: Everton get their first win under returning manager David Moyes to pile pressure on Tottenham counterpart Ange Postecoglou.
articles.title: Everton 3-2 Tottenham: Everton overpower Spurs to pile pressure on Postecoglou

articles.description: Novak Djokovic claims a convincing victory against Jiri Lehecka to set up a mouth-watering quarter-final against Carlos Alcaraz at the Australian Open.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Novak Djokovic beats Jiri Lehecka to set up quarter-final with Carlos Alcaraz

articles.description: Coco Gauff says she is "sad" TikTok is no longer usable in the United States but it will help her "read more books instead" after reaching the Australian Open quarter-finals.
articles.title: TikTok ban: Coco Gauff 'sad' about ban but vows to 'read more books' after Australian Open win

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Las Palmas in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Las Palmas: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Nottingham Forest move level on points with second-placed Arsenal after withstanding an unlikely comeback by bottom club Southampton at the City Ground.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest 3-2 Southampton: Forest move level on points with second-placed Arsenal after thriller

articles.description: Renee Slegers extends her unbeaten run as Arsenal manager with a thumping home win over bottom side Crystal Palace in the WSL.
articles.title: Arsenal 5-0 Crystal Palace: Gunners continue fine form with big WSL win

articles.description: Watch Sportscene, listen to Sportsound commentary and follow live text updates as Rangers host Highland League Fraserburgh in the Scottish Cup.
articles.title: Rangers vs Fraserburgh: Watch Scottish Cup live, plus stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: Shaun Murphy dominates the opening session of the Masters final to establish a 6-2 lead over world champion Kyren Wilson at Alexandra Palace.
articles.title: Masters snooker final 2025: Shaun Murphy leads Kyren Wilson 6-2 in Masters final
